'Kis Kisko Pyaar Karu' Movie Review : What critics have to say about Kapil Sharma's debut movie

Kapil Sharma has made a smashing debut with "Kis Kisko Pyaar Karu", but the film has failed to impress critics, suggest early reviews.

Kapil is making his Bollywood debut with "Kis Kisko Pyaar Karo" directed by Abbas Mustan. The romantic comedy film features an ensemble cast including Arbaaz Khan, Manjari Phadnis, Amrita Puri, Simran Kaur Mundi, Elli Avram, Sai Lokur, Varun Sharma, Supriya Pathak, Sharat Saxena, Manoj Joshi, Sharad Sankla (Charlie), and Johnny Lever's daughter Jamie Lever.

Kapil has built up a fan base with the help of his popular show "Comedy Nights With Kapil" and thus "Kis Kisko Pyaar Karu" was one of the most awaited films of the year. Unfortunately, the film has received mixed reviews.

While Kapil has managed to shine in his debut movie, the poor script and screenplay have pulled down the film, feels critics
